name: CT Special Forces 2: Back in the Trenches
name_original: CT Special Forces 2: Back in the Trenches
description: CT Special Forces 2: Back in the Trenches is a run and gun video game developed by Light and Shadow Productions and published by Hip Interactive. It was released on August 15, 2003 in Europe, and on June 29, 2004 in North America. In Europe, this game is known as CT Special Forces 2: Back to Hell.
